tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: pay is ok   this doctor deserve this much pay ,as  she is very experienced.her dealing is very supportive. treatment is very perfect.   immediat next day I have change in my condition. really great full to u procto for appointing such a experience doctors for us..  insted of going to the door steps number of times with un noticeble health issue, enough to reach online for an well experienced doctor I feel. mainly this service is very usefull for me as I am underwent tibial fracture . past 2mnth I am on rest. thankyou  mam

She is not at all friendly *** ******* *** ** ******.I am more stressed after her rude behaviour. My intention of approaching an online doctor is to clear doubts regarding my ongoing treatment. But she is not in a state to listen to what I am saying and straight away asked me to send my reports. She scolded me for practicing yoga not gym from last one year. Such a disappointment and I wasted money to make myself more stressed with her rude behaviour.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: she said she will call back after looking at the report but never happened. I had to spend my time and money. also her attitude wa very rude started calling me "*** ****** **** *** ***** ****** ** **** ************ * she didn't even there on the call for 2min *** **** **** *** ***** ** **** ******* *** completely unacceptable attitude from a senior mst doctor. I strongly don't recommend her.

review: I am actually an old patient of Ma’am, and was surprised that she still remembers me. I had some complications in my pregnancy and I wasn’t easy for me to travel to her so I opted for video consultation and discussed this with her. I was so relieved after that. I will be following up and taking consultation with her through your this period whenever required.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Excellent Experience with her.  She clears the doubts very well. Each visit helps to boost your mind positively
